title: U.S. Block-Trading Investigation Hits Morgan Stanley’s Plans to Expand in China
sub_head: China’s securities regulator cites U.S. probe, problems that arose in local inspection of bank’s securities business
body:
A U.S. investigation into block trading by Wall Street firms has ricocheted to China, potentially slowing Morgan Stanley ’s plans to expand its control of its brokerage and fund management businesses.
China’s securities regulator released a pair of statements Friday citing the U.S. investigation and problems that arose in an inspection of the bank’s securities business.
